main event: A construction worker observed an object that changed shape from moon-like to star-like over Las Vegas in 1964.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 35 minutes., The object was initially moon-shaped and transformed to a star-shape., The object exhibited bright glow and moved from northeast to northwest., The observation coincided with the release of a weather balloon from McGarren Field., The report concluded that the sighted object was likely a weather balloon.
witness description: a 25-year-old construction worker for Burghar Corp.
